sections.heading: Repealed.Section 46-5-2 - Repealed.Section 46-5-3 - Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 33-7-1, enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 1; repealed by Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84.

Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84 repealed 46-5-1 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 1, relating to the short title of the act, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 33-7-2, enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 2; repealed by Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84.

Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84 repealed 46-5-2 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 2, relating to testamentary additions to trusts, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.

sections.heading: Repealed.
sections.text:
History:1953 Comp., § 33-7-3, enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 4; repealed by Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84.

Repeals.— Laws 1993, ch. 174, § 84 repealed 46-5-3 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1965, ch. 26, § 4, relating to the uniformity of interpretation, effective July 1, 1993. For provisions of former sections,seethe 1992 NMSA 1978 onNMOneSource.com.
